member.name: CD3D11_VIEWPORT.CD3D11_VIEWPORT
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_VIEWPORT structure that is initialized with a structure.
member.param: Address of the structure that initializes the CD3D11_VIEWPORT structure.

member.name: CD3D11_VIEWPORT.CD3D11_VIEWPORT
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_VIEWPORT structure that is initialized with values.
member.param: X position of the left hand side of the viewport. Ranges between D3D11_VIEWPORT_BOUNDS_MIN and D3D11_VIEWPORT_BOUNDS_MAX.
Y position of the top of the viewport. Ranges between D3D11_VIEWPORT_BOUNDS_MIN and D3D11_VIEWPORT_BOUNDS_MAX.
Width of the viewport.
Height of the viewport.
Minimum depth of the viewport. Ranges between 0 and 1.
Maximum depth of the viewport. Ranges between 0 and 1.

member.name: CD3D11_VIEWPORT.CD3D11_VIEWPORT
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_VIEWPORT structure that is initialized with D3D11_BUFFER_RTV values.
member.param: A pointer to a ID3D11Buffer interface for a buffer.
A pointer to a ID3D11RenderTargetView interface for the render-target view.
X position of the left hand side of the viewport. Ranges between D3D11_VIEWPORT_BOUNDS_MIN and D3D11_VIEWPORT_BOUNDS_MAX.
Minimum depth of the viewport. Ranges between 0 and 1.
Maximum depth of the viewport. Ranges between 0 and 1.

member.name: CD3D11_VIEWPORT.CD3D11_VIEWPORT
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_VIEWPORT structure that is initialized with D3D11_TEX1D_RTV or D3D11_TEX1D_ARRAY_RTV values.
member.param: A pointer to a ID3D11Texture1D interface for a 1D texture.
A pointer to a ID3D11RenderTargetView interface for the render-target view.
X position of the left hand side of the viewport. Ranges between D3D11_VIEWPORT_BOUNDS_MIN and D3D11_VIEWPORT_BOUNDS_MAX.
Minimum depth of the viewport. Ranges between 0 and 1.
Maximum depth of the viewport. Ranges between 0 and 1.

member.name: CD3D11_VIEWPORT.CD3D11_VIEWPORT
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_VIEWPORT structure that is initialized with 2D texture values.
member.param: A pointer to a ID3D11Texture2D interface for a 2D texture.
A pointer to a ID3D11RenderTargetView interface for the render-target view.
X position of the left hand side of the viewport. Ranges between D3D11_VIEWPORT_BOUNDS_MIN and D3D11_VIEWPORT_BOUNDS_MAX.
Y position of the top of the viewport. Ranges between D3D11_VIEWPORT_BOUNDS_MIN and D3D11_VIEWPORT_BOUNDS_MAX.
Minimum depth of the viewport. Ranges between 0 and 1.
Maximum depth of the viewport. Ranges between 0 and 1.

member.name: CD3D11_VIEWPORT.CD3D11_VIEWPORT
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_VIEWPORT structure that is initialized with 3D texture values.
member.param: A pointer to a ID3D11Texture3D interface for a 3D texture.
A pointer to a ID3D11RenderTargetView interface for the render-target view.
X position of the left hand side of the viewport. Ranges between D3D11_VIEWPORT_BOUNDS_MIN and D3D11_VIEWPORT_BOUNDS_MAX.
Y position of the top of the viewport. Ranges between D3D11_VIEWPORT_BOUNDS_MIN and D3D11_VIEWPORT_BOUNDS_MAX.
Minimum depth of the viewport. Ranges between 0 and 1.
Maximum depth of the viewport. Ranges between 0 and 1.

member.name: CD3D11_VIEWPORT.CD3D11_VIEWPORT
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of an uninitialized CD3D11_VIEWPORT structure.

member.name: CD3D11_VIEWPORT
member.summary: Represents a viewport and provides convenience methods for creating viewports.
